name: 2016 Annual Conference on Global Economics, Business, and Finance
content: The 6th Annual Conference on Global Economics, Business, and Finance (GEBF) will be held in Hong Kong during June 8th-10th, 2016\. The main objective of this conference is to provide a platform for academicians, industrial professionals and researchers from over the world to present the result of their research activities in the field of Economics, Business, Finance, and Management. GEBF 2016 provides opportunities for the delegates to share the knowledge, ideas, innovations and problem solving techniques. For more information, please visit: http://acgebf.org/ or email: gebf@acgebf.org
